channel.title: Homes on Kulin Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kulin Shah

item.description: `Website under construction` ## Biography -- About me I am a research fellow at Microsoft Research India, where I work with Amit Deshpande and Navin Goyal. My current research focuses on understanding deep generative models through theory and experiments. Previously, I obtained my B.Tech. in Computer Science from International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad (IIIT-H), where I worked with Naresh Manwani from Machine Learning Lab. I like to understand and gain insights in practical machine learning algorithms using theory and experiments, and using those insights propose new algorithms to benefit practice with theoretical guarantees.

item.title: Positions
item.description: Subreviewer IJCAI 2019, IJCNN 2019, ACM IKDD CoDS-COMAD 2018 Teaching Assistant Linear Algebra (Spring 2019), Statistical Methods in AI (Spring 2018), Algorithms (Monsoon 2017)
